Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Springfield
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are rerouted in both directions via 26th, Pulaski, 31st, Central Park, 26th over regular route, due to blockage at 26th/Springfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Pulaski, 31st, Central Park, 26th over regular route, due to street blockage near 26th/Springfield.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Southbound Reroute near 100th/Hoxie
ShortDescription: Southbound J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 100th, Yates, 103rd and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 100th/Hoxie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 100th, Yates, 103rd and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 100th/Hoxie.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
